title: 88/187/EEC: Commission Decision of 23 February 1988 re- establishing the status of certain parts of the territory of the Federal Republic of Germany with regard to classical swine fever
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 23 February 1988  re-establishing the status of certain parts of the territory of the Federal Republic of Germany with regard to classical swine fever  (88/187/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The officially swine-fever free status of Brunswick, Lueneburg and Hanover in the Federal Republic of Germany is hereby re-established.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 February 1988.
